title: How to Make Your High School's Cheer Team

steps.title: Be confident!
steps.content: Be confident! Pretend you are the best girl or boy there and that there isn't a chance that you won't make it. The judges will notice and give you brownie points.

steps.title: Wear a school shirt, dance or athletic shorts, and cheer/tennis shoes.
steps.content: Wear a school shirt, dance or athletic shorts, and cheer/tennis shoes. For your hair, pull it into a ponytail with a bow, leaving no bangs hanging out. Show your spirit by wearing your team colors. Your appearance should be very neat and clean.

steps.title: Ask questions if you can't get part of the routine, if you are being taught one.
steps.content: Ask questions if you can't get part of the routine, if you are being taught one. Coaches will see that you aren't shy and you are a hard worker.

steps.title: Practice the routine, and ask older girls about their first try out experiences.
steps.content: Practice the routine, and ask older girls about their first try out experiences. Learn as much as you can. As a bonus, the coaches will love that you really really want this.

steps.title: Be very outgoing and talk to other girls trying out.
steps.content: Be very outgoing and talk to other girls trying out. The coach will see that you are confident and that your team matters to you.

steps.title: As you go into the tryout, yell your team's name with a lot of spirit.
steps.content: As you go into the tryout, yell your team's name with a lot of spirit. Jump up and down and do a high kick with a high V. Smile and show the coach that your routine is going to be awesome.

steps.title: If you mess up, don't stop!
steps.content: If you mess up, don't stop! Just keep doing cheer moves. If you forget the routine, try to do some cheer jumps. Never make it apparent that you messed up.

steps.title: Before you find out if you make it, think positive as if your routine was picture perfect.
steps.content: Before you find out if you make it, think positive as if your routine was picture perfect.

steps.title: Don't be discouraged if you don't make it.
steps.content: Don't be discouraged if you don't make it.
